feed.subtitle: Early career mathematician interested in optimization in its various flavors/contexts.

entry.title: What is going on with the $$T$$ in low-rank matrix completion?

link.title: What is going on with the $$T$$ in low-rank matrix completion?

entry.content: \(T\) is weird! Let’s talk about it.
entry.summary: The tangent space type object in matrix completion appears across the literature. This brief exposition will hopefully explain it!
